gems.name: ruby-shell
gems.info: A shell written in Ruby with extensive tab completions, aliases/nicks, history, syntax highlighting, theming, auto-cd, auto-opening files and more. UPDATE v3.4.5: FULL LS_COLORS COMPLIANCE - Prompt and command line now use LS_COLORS with pattern-based directory coloring. Configure @dir_colors like RTFM's @topmatch for visual project distinction. Plus v3.4.0: Completion learning, context-aware ranking, persistent patterns across sessions!
